title: Introduction
description: Welcome to Nuxt UI Pro documentation template.

children.value: This template is a ready-to-use documentation template made with
, a collection of premium components built on top of
to create beautiful & responsive Nuxt applications in minutes.
There are already many websites based on this template:
- The pro version of Nuxt Content
Full-Text Search out of the box
You can start playing with this template in your browser using our online sandboxes:

title: Installation
description: Get started with Nuxt UI Pro documentation template.

children.value: Use this template on Nuxt Studio and start your documentation in seconds.
You can start a fresh new project with:

props.className: language-bash shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight

children.value: or create a new repository from GitHub:
Enter repository name and click on
Install dependencies with your favorite package manager
That's it! You can now start writing your documentation in the

title: Usage
description: Learn how to write and customize your documentation.

, you can tweak it to match your needs. The template uses several Nuxt modules underneath like

directory to have your pages updated.
The navigation will be automatically generated in the left aside and in the mobile menu. You will also be able to go through your content with full-text search.
